text: The 2008 German Supercup, known as the T-Home Supercup for sponsorship reasons, was an unofficial edition of the German Supercup, a football match contested by the winners of the previous season's Bundesliga and DFB-Pokal competitions. The match was played at the Signal Iduna Park in Dortmund, and contested by league and cup winners Bayern Munich, and cup runners-up Borussia Dortmund. Dortmund won the match 2–1 to claim the unofficial title. ==Teams== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Team !
